Description.Text: Monte Carlo Aparthotel is a chic 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Batumi. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and an excellent location just off Batumi beach. Batumi beach is a vibrant and popular retreat for residents of Georgia and tourists alike. It offers golden sand, beautiful views of the Black Sea and plenty of shops and entertainment, notably an array of beachfront clubs. Nearby places of interest include Batumi Zoo, Batumi Botanical Garden and the Adjara State Museum. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Batumi destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Suites are 45sqm and decorated in a contemporary style. They comprise a cosy bedroom, separate living room with a sofa and dining table and chairs and a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge, oven, microwave and grill. They feature either a terrace or a balcony with garden views. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. The Monte Carlo restaurant offers French cuisine. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
